Title: Educational practice movement to comprehensively develop the Party's mass line
Publisher: Jiefangjun zong zhengzhibu xuanchuanwei (解放军总政治部宣传委)
Notes: Published by the Propaganda Committee of the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army.The full text:Educational practice movement to comprehensively develop the Party's mass line - stress the word "real", to strictly oppose formalism. Stress the word "to act", to strictly oppose bureaucratism. Stress the word "hardworking", to strictly oppose hedonism. Stress the word "thrifty", to strictly oppose extravagance
